name: Dodge The Swarm
description:
Don't ask me how you got into this situation. You encountered a giant bee's nest and your goal is to survive as long as you can from the attack of the swarm of angry bees. 

          This is a bullet hell game where you have to avoid the bees for as long as possible and get as much score as you can.

          Controls: W,A,S,D - movement ; ESC - pause

          This small game was made for the b3agz Jam (https://itch.io/jam/b3agz-jam) in a timespan of 3 days.
